aws_msk_configuration.description: Terraform resource for managing an Amazon Managed Streaming for Kafka configuration

server_properties.description: Contents of the server.properties file. Supported properties are documented in the [MSK Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/msk/latest/developerguide/msk-configuration-properties.html).

kafka_versions.description: List of Apache Kafka versions which can use this configuration.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.
